name: go_iris
description: 基于iris+xorm实现的Go语言Web项目模板

scripts.build_windows: SET CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 && go build -o ../go_dist/minigame_server_windows.exe main.go && cp -rf ./static ../go_dist/ && cp -rf ./views ../go_dist/
scripts.build_mac: SET CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 && go build -o ../go_dist/minigame_server_mac.exe main.go && cp -rf ./static ../go_dist/ && cp -rf ./views ../go_dist/
scripts.build_linux: SET CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 && go build -o ../go_dist/minigame_server_linux.exe main.go && cp -rf ./static ../go_dist/ && cp -rf ./views ../go_dist/

author: LIYI <9830131@qq.com>
